tgt_original: sarvakarmakṛtārakṣya dhyāyāddhṛtkaṇṭhamūrddhasu |  vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||
hṛcchiraḥ kaṇṭhamālabhya dadyātpuṣpādikaṃ kramāt ||198 ||  puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
ucchinnā durgati steṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhasya sambhavā |  yeṣāṃ caryāvare hyasminmatiratyantanirmalā ||207 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||  sarve parigṛhītāḥ stha jāyamānā mahātmabhiḥ |
śvetaṃ pītaṃ tathā raktaṃ haritaṃ kṛṣṇameva ca |
samapradakṣiṇācchinnāvakrāṃ rekhā prapātayet ||244 ||  samāṃ ca pātayedrekhāṃ dvāraviśatibhāgikām |
śvetavajramayī sūcī sauvarṇālambanāparā |  padmarāgamayī sūcī tathā marakatāparā ||247 ||  kṛṣṇābhyantarato jñeyā eṣa raṅgakramo'sya tu |
hṛdi saṃgrāhya tadvajraṃ vajreṇāpyabhiṣecayet ||307 ||  adyābhiṣiktastvamasi buddhairvajrābhiṣekataḥ |
dharmāḥ śuddhāḥ prakṛtyā yad buddhajñānacayaḥ sa hi ||309 ||
om vajrasattva tvāmabhiṣiñcāmi vajranāmābhiṣekataḥ |  he amuka vajra !  mūrdhnināmataḥ |
